meanings.definition: A particular philosophy or view of life.
meanings.sent1: Her weltanschauung shaped her decisions and actions.
meanings.sent2: His weltanschauung influenced his beliefs about the world.
meanings.sent3: The cat's weltanschauung seemed to involve napping in the sun all day.
meanings.sent4: In his weltanschauung, the ocean symbolized endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's weltanschauung emphasized the importance of kindness and empathy.

meanings.definition: A comprehensive conception or image of the universe and of humanity's relation to it.
meanings.sent1: Their shared weltanschauung led to deep conversations about existence.
meanings.sent2: The artist's weltanschauung was reflected in every brushstroke of the painting.
meanings.sent3: The robot's weltanschauung involved calculating the best path to take over the world.
meanings.sent4: In her weltanschauung, the stars were the guardians of the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The novel painted a vivid weltanschauung of a dystopian future.
